rules.natural: If the vaccine candidate is approved, then vaccine doses are distributed
Either the vaccine candidate is approved, or if the simulation model is running, then the disease outbreak is contained
If the FDA application is rejected, then the vaccine candidate is not approved
Either the FDA application is rejected or clinical trials are halted
If clinical trials are halted, then the vaccine candidate is not approved
If emergency funding is authorized, then diagnostic sensors are calibrated
Either emergency funding is authorized or research budget is allocated
If research budget is allocated, then whenever the threat database is updated, the disease outbreak is contained
If medical data is encrypted, then the database contains patient records
If cloud servers are secured, then the disease outbreak is contained
If the contact tracing module is accessible, then the database contains patient records
Either the contact tracing module is accessible or the prediction algorithm is operational
If a cyber attack is detected, then hacker access is blocked
Either a cyber attack is detected or malware is identified
If malware is identified, then the security system is not breached
If hacker access is blocked, then the security system is not breached
If the virus genome is analyzed, then a mutation pattern is identified
If genetic research is funded, then research findings are published
Either genetic research is funded or the bioinformatics team is supported
If the bioinformatics team is supported, then whenever a mutation pattern is identified, the emergency protocol is activated
If the prediction algorithm is operational, then the disease outbreak is contained
If research findings are published, then whenever a mutation pattern is identified, the emergency protocol is activated
If side effects are discovered, then whenever the vaccine candidate is approved, vaccine doses are not distributed
If adverse reactions are reported, then whenever the vaccine candidate is approved, vaccine doses are not distributed
If vaccine safety is monitored, then either side effects are discovered or adverse reactions are reported
Either medical staff are trained or healthcare workers are educated
If healthcare workers are educated, then whenever the threat database is updated, the disease outbreak is contained
If triage protocol is implemented, then whenever medical staff are not trained to ensure that threat database updates lead to disease containment, the hospital system becomes overwhelmed
If crisis management is activated, then triage protocol is implemented
If the emergency protocol is activated, then whenever patient zero is not infected and the disease outbreak is not contained, patient zero is not quarantined
If the diagnostic toolkit is deployed, then the emergency protocol is activated
Either the diagnostic toolkit is deployed or the AI scanner is functional
If the AI scanner is functional, then the emergency protocol is activated
If medical data is not encrypted and cloud servers are not secured, then the security system is breached
If medical staff are not trained to ensure that threat database updates lead to disease containment, then the hospital system does not become overwhelmed
If patient zero is not infected and the disease outbreak is not contained, then patient zero is quarantined

If it is not the case that when outbreak source is not verified and when patient zero is not infected and disease is not contained then patient zero is not quarantined leads to zoonotic transmission confirmation, then an animal reservoir is established

If it is not the case that when outbreak source is not verified and when patient zero is not infected and disease is not contained then patient zero is not quarantined leads to zoonotic transmission confirmation, then an animal reservoir is not established
If vaccine safety is not monitored, then a safety warning is issued
If vaccine safety is not monitored, then a safety warning is not issued
